channel.title: Help with java again
channel.description:
I need help with getting clients and servers running. When ever I try running a Dos file I get this:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
I can run jar files but not dos. Like When I run mopars client, If I run the dos I get that error, but if I run the jar it works. I'm so cunfused and so far all the advice people gave me dont work.
I NEED HELP!
oh and the perfect compiler wont work.

item.title: Help with java again
item.dc:creator: @bigmc91 bigmc91
item.description:
@bigmc91 wrote:

I need help with getting clients and servers running. When ever I try running a Dos file I get this:

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

I can run jar files but not dos. Like When I run mopars client, If I run the dos I get that error, but if I run the jar it works. I’m so cunfused and so far all the advice people gave me dont work.

I NEED HELP!

oh and the perfect compiler wont work.
